basic.description:
A credit/non-credit practicum for 48 hours of extra-curricular work in drama related fields, including departmental productions.
LEARNING HOURS    48 (6I;42P)
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Drama Practicum

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    A grade of B- in 6.0 units from (DRAM100;DRAM181;BISC100;BISC101) or permission of the Department.
Corequisite    DRAM240
